header.apresentation: Hello, welcome! I'm excited to share my world of programming and innovation with you! Feel free to explore, and discover that here, I not only turn ideas into code but also bring them to life!

about.title: about me
about.description:
Welcome, masters, knights, and padawans of this galaxy (and others too). My name is Jelson, and I am the creator of this website. I am 19 years old, a software engineering student at UEPG, and also a junior programmer. In addition to technology and programming, I am also a fan of games, series, movies, and books. 
I created this site to showcase some of my work, contact information, and future projects. Inspired by the classic saga of George Lucas, I decided to pay tribute to this masterpiece, which is one of the most important works in the history of cinema and in my life. 
If you are interested in developing software, don't hesitate to get in touch! See you soon, and may the Force be with you!
